Subject: Re: DrillBit arrives
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 138
From: Rudra656@...

::Cygnar::
    "You should go now.  With explicit instructions to pull out if it gets 
too rough.  Do you understand?  This is not a suicide mission.  If you're 
going to be killed or captured get out of there.  I do not want to lose 
anyone.  Now MOVE OUT!"  He turns to Drill Bit again.  "Now then if you have 
something you wish to discuss about my plan step into my office."  He walks 
into his office off of the briefing room.
